What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy flocked to the moon and settled. Some of these have settled into a cross between resort and club-life where they can complain about and enjoy dish-washing by 3rd-cost Americans without having to threaten them at gun.
